meanings.definition: To combine or merge into one entity
meanings.sent1: The two rivers interfusing to form a larger stream.
meanings.sent2: The flavors of the dish interfuse to create a unique taste.
meanings.sent3: The magician seemed to be interfusing objects into thin air.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like interfusing two souls into one.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset interfused with the clouds in a breathtaking display.
